header.title: French register of deceased persons
message.network_error: The connection to the server could not be established. Please ensure that you are connected to the internet or try again later.
message.news:
The interface has been entirely redesigned and new features were added; do not hesitate to give us a feedback.

You can still come back to the legacy version if you so desire.

result.warning.item.period_early: The year is too far back

info.title: Information
info.important_remarks.title: Important remarks
info.important_remarks.content: This service relies on data provided by Insee (register of deceased persons since {year}). Insee cannot guarantee that the data is complete and free of errors. In particular, these information do not have any legal value: only the official civil act does, and can be requested from the corresponding city hall. As of now there is no form to report the potential errors in the data.
info.search_parameters.title: Search parameters
info.search_parameters.names.title: Last and first names
info.search_parameters.names.description: To execute a search you must enter at least one last name, it is not mandatory to include a first name. You may enter several last and/or first names, only the entries containing all these names will be returned, regardless the order in which they appear. The accents are ignored and the compound names are split apart.
info.search_parameters.places.title: Places
info.search_parameters.places.descriptio: You may provide a place to refine the search. This can be either a city, a department, a region or a country. Only the results for which an event occurred at that place will be kept.
info.search_parameters.dates.title: Dates
info.search_parameters.dates.description: You may also refine the search using dates. For that you may select an event type, birth or death, and provide a period expressed in years. Finally, you may also change the order in which the results are displayed, by dates ascending or descending, for the said event type.
info.confidentiality.title: Confidentiality
info.confidentiality.content: This service does not contain any tracker or cookies. Access logs are kept temporarily to ensure normal functioning of the service. The data is not indexed by the search engines.
info.faq.title: Frequently asked questions
info.faq.cannot_find.question: Why can't I find what I am looking for?
info.faq.cannot_find.answer: There are several explanations possible. First of all, ensure that the person died between 1970 and a month before the last update of the data ({date}). Additionally, verify that one of the two civil events (birth or death) occurred in France. Sometimes the names or the dates are incorrectly spelled; in these cases the data is there, but harder to find. It can also happen that an entry is completely missing. In any case one should not draw any conclusion from a lack of results.
info.faq.found_error.question: What should I do if I find an error in the data?
info.faq.found_error.answer: Unfortunately Insee does not currently provide a way to report such errors. Therefore there is nothing to do from your side.
info.faq.removal.question: May I ask for the deletion of an entry?
info.faq.removal.answer: According to the décret n°2017-890 relatif à l'état civil, article 30, alinéa 6, "les copies intégrales des actes de décès […] peuvent être délivrées à toute personne" (the copies of a civil act […] may be provided to anyone). The GDPR only applies to living persons. For practical reasons this site uses the original dataset without applying any modification, therefore we do not provide any deletion procedure. It is useful to know that the search results are not indexed by search engines.
info.faq.data_update.question: When is the data updated?
info.faq.data_update.answer: Insee publishes new data every month, we then fetch this data to update this website. Since we process the data by batches, there can be a delay of a few months between every update. The date the data was last updated is displayed at the bottom of the page.
footer.credit: Designed and hosted by {author} using the data provided by Insee, without being affiliated.
footer.contact_remark: Remark: please do not use this address to report errors in the data (see FAQ).
